function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited coverage of other sustainability rating systems","Impact":"Reduction in the adoption and implementation of comprehensive strategies across all rating systems","Mitigation":"Encourage collaboration and information sharing among different sustainability rating systems","Technologies":"Online platforms, communication tools, and knowledge sharing systems","People":"Stakeholders, sustainability rating system administrators","Owner":"Collaborative industry organizations and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Reliance on voluntary adoption","Impact":"Potential lack of consistent and widespread implementation of best practices","Mitigation":"Incentivize and reward adoption through incentives, recognition, and certification","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for certification, incentive tracking systems","People":"Building owners, developers, and occupants","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Focus on mechanical ventilated workspaces","Impact":"Neglect of other types of workspaces and environments that may also contribute to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Expand guidelines to cover a wider range of workspaces and environments, such as natural ventilation and outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, data analytics tools for ventilation assessment","People":"Architects, designers, and building facility managers","Owner":"Sustainability rating system administrators, industry organizations"}]}
